DOC.brief_title: Investigating Relationships Among Illness Cognition , Social Support , Stress , Emotional Reactions Infertile Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The current study attempt explore relationship among stressor ( cognition illness , socioeconomic status , social support , marital stressor , social stressor , etc ) , perceive stress level , emotional reaction ( anxiety depression ) infertile patient propose measurement structural model infertile aniexty depression . Structural Equation Modeling ( SEM ) utilize AMOS 17 analyze data , construct initial model , afterward present modified structural model psychological response infertile patient .
